history.title: Our History
history.text1: InoveBIO was born from the bold and determined vision of Fernando, who went from being an employee to becoming the heart of the operation and the soul of an innovative project. Committed to the planet's sustainable future, the company specializes in supplying inputs for biodiesel production, serving organizations seeking renewable, clean, and responsible energy solutions. With a qualified team (including professionals such as a dedicated chemist), InoveBIO transforms what would be waste into valuable raw material.
history.text2: Vegetable oils, animal fats, and organic waste are converted into high-quality biofuel through advanced processes such as transesterification, strengthening the circular economy and reducing the environmental footprint. More than a supplier, InoveBIO is a new business model: sustainable, intelligent, and bold.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: To provide high-quality inputs for biodiesel production, combining innovation, technical knowledge, and environmental responsibility to support companies seeking renewable and conscious energy solutions.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be a reference in the biofuels sector as a company that transforms waste into clean energy, driving the circular economy and contributing to a sustainable future.

excellence.title: Agile excellence
excellence.text: We do it well, with speed and adaptability.

innovation.title: Transformative innovation
innovation.text: We create solutions that move the sector and the planet toward the future.

focus.title: Customer focus, always
focus.text: We listen, understand, and deliver real value to those with us.

partnerships.title: Valuable partnerships
partnerships.text: We believe in strong alliances that accelerate ideas and results.

commitment.title: Commitment to the future
commitment.text: We act with environmental awareness and social responsibility to leave a positive legacy.

purpose.title: Our Purpose is to transform ...
purpose.text: what is discarded into clean energy, driving sustainability and proving that it is possible to unite innovation, courage, and environmental responsibility to build a better future for everyone.
purpose.quote: A green powerhouse that transforms everything into biodiesel.
purpose.statement: Acting with intelligence and responsibility to ensure a future worth living.

howItWorks.title: Supply of inputs for biodiesel
howItWorks.description: At InoveBIO, we believe that strategic partnerships are the fuel to transform the future of energy. That's why we seek companies that share our vision of sustainability and innovation to, together, boost quality biodiesel production and reduce environmental impacts.

quality.title: Guaranteed quality:
quality.text: high-standard inputs for efficient biodiesel production.

diversity.title: Raw material diversity:
diversity.text: vegetable oils, animal fats, and organic waste, ensuring flexibility and continuity in supply.

technology.title: Technology and innovation:
technology.text: advanced chemical processes, such as transesterification, that guarantee superior performance.

commitment.title: Environmental commitment:
commitment.text: each partnership strengthens the circular economy and helps reduce the carbon footprint.

quality.title: Superior Quality
quality.description: High-quality inputs that ensure efficiency and performance in biodiesel production, with rigorous control standards.

rawMaterial.title: Raw Material Diversity
rawMaterial.description: We work with a wide range of raw materials: vegetable oils, animal fats, and organic waste, offering flexibility and security in supply.

technology.title: Advanced Technology
technology.description: We use cutting-edge chemical processes, such as transesterification, to transform inputs into high-performance, low-environmental-impact biodiesel.

commitment.title: Environmental Commitment
commitment.description: Each partnership with InoveBIO strengthens the circular economy and contributes to reducing the carbon footprint, promoting a more sustainable future.

cliente.intro: If your company seeks renewable, clean, and responsible energy solutions, InoveBIO is the right partner to move towards a more sustainable future.

fornecedor.label: BECOME OUR SUPPLIER
fornecedor.title: I Want to Sell to InoveBIO
fornecedor.intro: At InoveBIO, we see value where many see only waste. That's why we seek suppliers who share our vision of transforming waste into clean energy, creating business opportunities aligned with sustainability.
fornecedor.formTitle: Fill out the form and become our supplier.

cycle.title: Sustainable cycle:
cycle.text: together, we strengthen the circular economy.

about.title: About Us

description.p1: InoveBIO is a company dedicated to sustainable biodiesel production, transforming waste into clean energy.
description.p2: With cutting-edge technology and certified processes, we guarantee quality and efficiency in every liter of biodiesel produced.
description.p3: Our commitment is to the environment and building a more sustainable future for all.
